content: around do not join 84 double_crochet begin decreases round 8 decrease round *double_crochet in next 5 double_crochet decrease repeat from * around do not join 72 double_crochet round 9 decrease round *double_crochet in next 4 double_crochet decrease repeat from * around do not join 60 double_crochet round 10 decrease round *double_crochet in next 3 double_crochet decrease repeat from * around join with slip_stitch 48 double_crochet continue to work in joined rounds as follows round 11 chain 2 half_double_crochet in ea double_crochet around join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain-2 48 half_double_crochet rnds 12-13 chain 2 half_double_crochet in ea half_double_crochet around join with slip_stitch 48 half_double_crochet round 14 chain 1 single_crochet in ea half_double_crochet around join with slip_stitch 48 single_crochet fasten_off and weave in tails copyright 2017 2008 kathy north -- www ravelry com/designers/kathy-north for personal or charity use only do not duplicate pattern for commercial purposes
